text: Garhshankar Assembly Constituency (Sl. No.: 45) is a Punjab Legislative Assembly constituency in Hoshiarpur district, Punjab state, India. Currently, it is represented by Jai Kishan Singh Rodi of the Aam Aadmi Party. ==Lok Sabha Candidates from this segment in 2014== #Himmat Singh Shergill #Prem Singh Chandumajra #Ambika Soni #K.S. Makhan ==Last elections== The last assembly elections were held in February 2017 ==Population== Garhshankar has a population of 3.02 lakhs as per census of 2011. ==Previous MLA List== 2012-2017 Surinder Singh Bhullewal Rathaan, Shiromani Akali Dal 2007-2012 Love Kumar Goldy, Indian National Congress 2004-2007 (Bye elections) Love Kumar Goldy, Indian National Congress 2002-2004 Avinash Rai Khanna, BJP 1997-2002 Shingara Ram Bahujan Samaj Party 1992-1997 Shingara Ram Bahujan Samaj Party ==References== Category:Assembly constituencies of Punjab, India Category:Hoshiarpur district
title: Garhshankar Assembly Constituency
